original_text: So they set up Micah's carved image that he made, as long as the house of God was at Shiloh.
korean_text: 하나님의 집이 실로에 있을 동안에 미가가 만든 바 새긴 신상이 단 자손에게 있었더라

sentences.original_text: So they set up Micah's carved image
as long as the house of God was at Shiloh
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 집이 실로에 있는 동안에는 그랬습니다
